definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: People undergoing cancer therapy may have low blood-cell counts.
sentences.chinese: 正接受癌症治疗的人血细胞数目会偏低。

sentences.english: Method Whole blood cell count was detected in 5822 healthy Tibetans in Ganzi plateau.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解甘孜州藏区健康人全血细胞计数参考范围。

sentences.english: Objective To study the value and the clinical application of the suspect epigrams of automated blood analyzer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨血细胞分析仪异常警句在临床应用的价值。

sentences.english: The first is the blood cell-forming organ. This is the site where myelogenous leukemia begins.
sentences.chinese: 它首先是血细胞形成器官，髓细胞白血病即从此发源。

sentences.english: Group II consists of 13 patients, served as control without receiving autotransfusion.
sentences.chinese: 对照组13例，不接受自体血细胞洗涤回输。

sentences.english: This form of vitamin B helps to form red blood cells.
sentences.chinese: 这种形式的B族维生素，有助于形成红血细胞。

sentences.english: Objective A report of a group of patients with pancytopenia which might be related to abnormal immunity.
sentences.chinese: 目的报告一组与异常免疫相关的全血细胞减少症。

sentences.english: Frequent monitoring of blood counts should be instituted during ABRAXANE treatment.
sentences.chinese: 本品治疗过程中应严密监测血细胞计数。

sentences.english: The defense response of hemocytes in the silkworm, Bombyx mori to Beauveria bassiana was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了家蚕血细胞对病原白僵菌的防御反应。

sentences.english: Such expansion ex vivo may not influence the expression of the adhesive molecule CD44 on cord blood cells.
sentences.chinese: 体外扩增不影响跻血细胞黏附分子CD44的表达。

sentences.english: In some kinds of anemia, there are low amounts of all three types of blood cells.
sentences.chinese: 在一些类型的贫血中，三种类型的血细胞含量都低。

sentences.english: The result of MTT was consistent to that of cell count technique.
sentences.chinese: MTT比色法结果与血细胞板计数法结果一致。

sentences.english: Patients can have white cells removed by a machine. The process is called leukapheresis.
sentences.chinese: 这些干细胞可以帮助机体在治疗后产生健康的血细胞。

sentences.english: Thrombocyte is round or irregular in shape.
sentences.chinese: 凝血细胞呈球形或不规则形。

sentences.english: Haemocytes play important roles in crustacean immune responses.
sentences.chinese: 血细胞在甲壳动物的免疫系统中具有重要作用。

sentences.english: Instead, these critters have blood cells called thrombocytes, which are about twice the size of platelets.
sentences.chinese: 它们体内有一种凝血细胞，是我们血小板的两倍大。

definition: neutrophil (the most common type of white blood cell)
